fields.name: Bleed - Debuff
fields.description: Suffers damage per stack after enemy turn. Reduces by 1 when triggered. Ignores Fortitude and isn't affected by Rage.

fields.name: Potions
fields.description: Don't take up deck space. Used and permanently consumed at start of combat.

fields.name: Vulnerable - Debuff
fields.description: Suffers 50% more damage. Reduces by 1 each turn.

fields.name: Consumable
fields.description: After playing this card, it is permanently destroyed.

fields.name: Permanent
fields.description: This card can not be removed from your deck, and will not take up space in your deck.

fields.name: Block
fields.description: Reduces current Threat.

fields.name: Destroy
fields.description: When sent to Discard, it is instead permanently removed.

fields.name: Volatile
fields.description: Can't be Purged. Destroyed after being played, Discarded or at the end of turn.

fields.name: Expel
fields.description: Removed from Battle.

fields.name: Weak - Debuff
fields.description: Reduces AP by 25%, to a minimum of 1. Reduces by 1 each turn.

fields.name: Slow - Debuff
fields.description: Reduces Frenzy by 1 per stack (minimum of 1). Reduces by 1 each turn.

fields.name: Rigged
fields.description: At the start of battle, or when your deck is reshuffled, place this card on top of your deck.

fields.name: Taunt
fields.description: Must be the target of Attack cards.

fields.name: Overcharge
fields.description: Max Energy is increased by 1 per stack. At the start of each turn, gain 1 extra Energy and reduce Overcharge by 1.

fields.name: Unplayable
fields.description: Can not be played. Fancy that.

fields.name: Scrap
fields.description: Automatically discarded at the end of enemy turn.

fields.name: Fortitude
fields.description: Damage an enemy suffers will be removed from their Fortitude first. Removed at the start of the enemy's next turn.

fields.name: Threat
fields.description: When enemies attack, it is added to your Threat. Reduce Threat with Block. At the end of your turn, left over Threat reduces your HP.

fields.name: Burning
fields.description: Suffer Threat equal to Burning at the start of your turn. Purging cards reduce Burning by 1.

fields.name: Minion
fields.description: Defeating the center enemy will end the fight, killing all Minions.

fields.name: Immune
fields.description: Immune to all damage and Debuffs (Bleed, Weak, Slow, etc)

fields.name: Evasive
fields.description: Can't be the target of Attack Cards if there are enemies without evasive.

fields.name: Fear
fields.description: After drawing, discard cards equal to your Fear value.

fields.name: Cripple
fields.description: At the start of your turn, draw X less cards. Clears at the end of the turn.

fields.name: Confusion
fields.description: All cards increase their Energy cost by 1. Clears at the end of the turn.

fields.name: Hex
fields.description: The next card you play will be sent to your Discard, and won't be played. Cleared at the end of your turn.

fields.name: Stun
fields.description: At the start of your turn, you will lose energy equal to your Stun value. Removed at the end of your turn.

fields.name: Poison
fields.description: Suffer Threat equal to Poison at the start of your turn. Reduces by 1 at the end of your turn.

fields.name: Haunted
fields.description: Void Stone powers won't trigger while Haunted. Reduces by 1 each time you trigger a Void Stone.

fields.name: Corruption
fields.description: Built up during Battle, usually by card effects or Purging.

fields.name: Rebound
fields.description: The first time played in a turn, the card will be returned to your hand. Expel or Volatile cards won't Rebound.

fields.name: Swift
fields.description: Card will trigger +X times, equal to your Combo. Combo is then reset.

fields.name: Heavy
fields.description: Cards with the Heavy keyword. Keywords shown at the bottom of cards.

fields.name: Buff
fields.description: Card effects that will last for the entire battle. Their effects can be stacked.

fields.name: Purge
fields.description: Click and hold Right Mouse to Purge a card, gaining +1 Energy and sending it to your Discard. Some cards may have additional effects if Purged.

fields.name: Frenzy
fields.description: Represents how many times an enemy will Attack. Enemies will attack for damage equal to their AP, multiplied by their Frenzy.

fields.name: Affliction Cards
fields.description: Negative cards, can't be Purged. Commonly Voids, Banes & Dazes.

fields.name: Void Cards
fields.description: Can be gained in a variety of ways. They are permanent and can't normally be removed from your deck.

fields.name: Recur
fields.description: Return a chosen card from your Discard to your hand.

fields.name: Slay
fields.description: Triggers if you kill an enemy with the card.

fields.name: Sift
fields.description: Discard a card from your Deck.

fields.name: Opener
fields.description: Will trigger if the card is the first card played in a turn.

fields.name: Clone
fields.description: A copy of this card will be added to your Discard.

fields.name: Discard
fields.description: Effects trigger if you Discard the card, rather than playing it. Purging isn't considered Discarding.

fields.name: Combo
fields.description: Swift cards will trigger +X times where X is equal to your Combo. Combo resets after triggering.

fields.name: Balanced
fields.description: Swift cards that are Balanced benefit from Combo, but does not consume it.

fields.name: Corruption Lock
fields.description: Can no longer gain Corruption. Expires at end of turn.

fields.name: Cycle
fields.description: For the remainder of the turn, draw 1 whenever you play a card.

fields.name: Soultithe
fields.description: Gain a point of Corruption for each point of Soultithe gained. At the start of your turn, suffer Threat equal to your Soultithe.

fields.name: Delay Block
fields.description: Block at the start of your next turn, before drawing cards.

fields.name: Set Up
fields.description: The next card played will be sent to the top of your Deck.

fields.name: Rage
fields.description: This turn, Attack and Affliction cards deal X% more damage.

fields.name: Stealth
fields.description: Enemy creatures will skip their first turn. This effect can't be stacked.

fields.name: Enemy Attack Actions
fields.description: Any action planned by a creature which will result in it Attacking.

fields.name: Death Strike
fields.description: If your Death Strike is equal or higher than an Attack card's Energy cost, trigger +1 times. Reduce Death Strike by this card's Energy cost. 0 costs still reduce Death Strike by 1.

fields.name: Future Strike
fields.description: Inflicts damage at the end of every EVEN turn, then resets to 0. Not a Debuff.

fields.name: Foresight
fields.description: Reduce the cost of a card from your deck to 0 until that card is played. Clone and Ghost copies won't retain this.

fields.name: Follow Up
fields.description: Triggers if your Chain matches with the card's type, or if you're in Zen.

fields.name: Zen State
fields.description: Enter Zen by playing 3 cards of the same type. In Zen, all cards will cost -1 energy. Duration: 5 cards played or end of turn.

fields.name: Vision
fields.description: Choose a card from your discard to place on top of your deck.

fields.name: Rewind
fields.description: Target creature's intention is changed to what it cast the turn prior.

fields.name: Chain
fields.description: Playing cards of the same type (Attack/Ability/Buff) sequentially will advance your Chain. At 3, enter Zen.

fields.name: Echo Wall
fields.description: Enemies will suffer damage equal to any Threat they inflict. Reduces by 1 at the start of your turn.

fields.name: Fatigue (Prayer Beads)
fields.description: Scales your Future Strike, increasing the number of times it's applied. Scales your Shii by adding its value to any applied.

fields.name: Transfer
fields.description: When a Debuff is Transferred, it is allocated to another random creature.

fields.name: Ghost
fields.description: Add a Volatile copy of this card to your hand.

fields.name: Inert
fields.description: This card's Void Stone only triggers once per turn.

fields.name: Shii
fields.description: Shii exceeding an enemy's HP will destroy it, transfering 50% split between remaining enemies. Unaffected by Vulnerable. Not a Debuff.

fields.name: Desync
fields.description: Won't add to or interrupt your chain.

fields.name: Solo
fields.description: Will trigger if the target is the only creature alive.

fields.name: Fatigued
fields.description: Will trigger if the target has Fatigue.

fields.name: Threshold
fields.description: If your Soultithe is equal to or above this value.

fields.name: Weakened
fields.description: Whilst Weakened, you can not gain Rage. Reduces by 1 at the end of your turn.

fields.name: Loop
fields.description: This card will be shuffled into your Deck. Expel and Volatile won't Loop.

fields.name: Trigger
fields.description: Card effects repeat additional X times, include Void Stones. Triggers can't create more triggers. Counts as being 'played' once.

fields.name: Delay Rage
fields.description: Next turn, gain X Rage. Rage increases Attack cards damage. Stacked additively.

fields.name: Clot
fields.description: Consume X Bleed from the target.

fields.name: AP (Attack Power)
fields.description: Represents the strength of each attack. Enemies will attack for this much damage, multiplied by their Frenzy.

fields.name: X Cost
fields.description: Consumes all your Energy, powering an effect multiple times. Ignores any cost modification.

fields.name: Delay Draw
fields.description: You'll draw a extra X cards at the start of next turn.

fields.name: Zeal
fields.description: Gain 1 Zeal for every energy spent, triggering Zeal powers at certain levels. Resets at the end of turn.

fields.name: Discharge
fields.description: Consume X Overcharge.

fields.name: Fervour
fields.description: Gain Fervour by defeating enemies on Heretic sites. Spend your Fervour on new Zeal Abilities.

fields.name: Shock - Debuff
fields.description: An enemy's Shock will be added to an Attack card's damage (before Rage is applied!). Then Shock is reduced by half (rounding down).

fields.name: Fumble
fields.description: The next X non-affliction cards you draw are sent to discard and replaced with Volatile copies.
